:::Arcangel/Sharpedge/Jetstorm:::

::Uh-oh, he thoght::
Arcangel: Um, were fighting FOR the Maximals...  Id better make you a maximal 
again, and fast.
::He thought for a second.  no one could help now.  he doubted that anyone 
would want to take on a problem less important than Dinobot's life::
Arcangel: Aw man!  Listen kid, im taking you to the battle, but i dont want 
to see you shooting other Maximals!
::he transformed to beast mode and flies out, hoping Trinity was following::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Sharpedge gets mostly hit in the arm.  He runs up to Bloodystrike and tries 
to use his spinner hand on him.  Jetstorm gets hit in the chest by the rifle 
shots, but dodges the missles.  he fires 25 rapid optci blasts and 25 energy 
blasts at Reptilica::
